about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE AGE OF ADVENT!


Play four minigames based on the members of hololive -Advent-!

Bijem'd


The pickaxes are coming! Help the Moai escape before they get here! Clear the path to the bottom by clicking on groups of matching colors, and rack up combos by saving groups of Moai quickly!

The Demon Of Sound and Soup


Is a dance club the best place to make a demonic soup? Maybe not, but it's close enough to a kitchen for Nerissa! Move to the beat of the music and round up partygoers ingredients. Get the conga line as big as you can, then drop them off in Nerissa's pot! And watch out for the F-bombs. Someone really needs to watch their language...

We're Abaubaut to Crash!


Fuwawa and Mococo can't find the brakes! Control both of them at the same time in this multitasking infinite minecart level. Collect gems, avoid pits, bonk Pero, and work together to last as long as you can as the track keeps getting faster and more dangerous!

Archival Survival


Farming in the middle of the night? Do plants usually sprout books? Why couldn't they put the seeds next to the water? Well, nevertheless, plant and harvest as many crops as you can tonight. And remember: DON'T. LET. THEM. SEE. YOU.

Rideshare Rebellion


They're new in town, they just escaped from prison, and don't ask where they got that car! Now how can the members of Advent make enough cash to start streaming? The gig economy! Drive passengers around the city, and remember: the faster the trip, the bigger the tip!

name: Age of Advent
short_description: Welcome to the Age of Advent! Play four minigames based on the members of hololive -Advent-! Save the Moai with Bijou, make a soup with Nerissa, try not to crash with FUWAMOCO, and avoid the gaze of Shiori!
